bibl.title: Letter from Philip Showalter Hench to J. Randin, April 7, 1942

div1.p: Hench thanks Randin for the aerial photographs of the Military Hospital, showing where Lazear died.

div1.head: Letter from Philip Showalter Hench to J. Randin, April 7, 1942
div1.opener:
April 7, 1942
Dr. J. Randin
Ciudad Militar, Cuartel “Cabo Parrado”
Havana, Cuba
My dear Doctor Randin:
div1.p:
I cannot tell you how much I appreciate the
new air photographs of the Military Hospital showing the
site where Dr. Lazear died. They will be most useful
to me and I am sorry I have bothered you so much to get
them.

I regret I cannot get the copy which was
published but these will serve me very well.
div1.closer: Very truly yours, P. S. Hench, M. D. psh:ds
